C3-Cloud 
Start date     01/05/2016

Call     H2020-PHC-2015-single-stage 
Topic     PHC-25-2015 
Advanced ICT systems and services for integrated care 
 
 
EMIF 
Title: European Medical Information Framework 
Budget: 56 317 001€ 
www.emif.eu
goals__remit:
The EUROREC Institute (EuroRec) is an independent not-for-profit organisation, promoting in Europe the use of high quality Electronic Health Record systems (EHRs). One of its main missions is to support, as the European authorised certification body, EHRs certification development, testing and assessment by defining functional and other criteria. 
 
EuroRec is organised as a permanent network of National ProRec centres and provides services to industry (developers and vendors), healthcare providers (buyers), policy makers and patients.
